name: Spacebar (cnnmon)
description:
Spacebar is a game about practicing your typing skills in an engaging way! As a new astronaut, your job is visiting planets, typing through their story excerpts, and collecting gems, while being careful to type fast enough as to not fall beneath it or get interrupted by too many obstacles. Try to reach your highest WPM!

Features:

  • Customizable speed through pause menu
  • Collectible outfits
  • Save data and highest WPM score
  • Unique planets with excerpts from classic books and poems
  • Randomly generating powerups and powerdowns
  • And more!

How to play: Press space to pass dialogue. Type to enter text in the run sequences. Use UP/DOWN arrow keys to navigate the planet map. The buttons, outfit navigation, and toggles require mouse interaction.

Check out the source code here!
